description.value: Hobby centaurs are racers, named after “the hobby sport” they practice. Hobbies are great at building up momentum and keeping it going, making them blazing fast adventurers, deliverers, racer, or otherwise.

system.classDetails:
Hobby Centaur Traits

  • Compatibility: Bestial (or Hominid with Alternate Compatibility)
  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 1.
  • Increased Move Speed: Your movement speed is increased by +10ft.
  • Momentum: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.G1YU7ORIXJ5VTL9G]{Momentum}
  • *Alternate Compatibility: You can choose to instead have the Hominid compatibility for the sake of mix-racing, gaining the following traits.
    • Proficiency: You have proficiency in Strength (Athletics).
